text: Pingjie an la jiang shi de ci min, ni ceng he'ai di duidai tamen. Jiaru ni cubao, yanku [di duidai tamen], tamen biding tong ni fendaoyangbiaole. Suoyi, ni dang yuanliang tamen [de guoshi], dang qiu zhu kuanshu tamen, zai dashi shang yao yu tamen xieshang. Ruguo ni yi zuo jueding, name, ni dang xinlai an la. An la dique xihuan xinlai zhe.
